sentence: pick up the red block you have not moved yet and place it on top of the yellow block near the red blocks
pick up the red block in the center and place it on top of the yellow block near the red blocks
stack the rightmost red block on top of the yellow block so that it is aligned with the right side of the second red block you moved
stack the rightmost red block on top of the leftmost yellow block
pick up the red block you did not move and place it on top of the left yellow block
